title: Enterprise Sales Engineer
description:
What you will do
  
  

As a Sales Engineer, you'll be the technical expertise of our sales team which means you will translate complex security solutions into clear, actionable insights for potential and existing clients. In this role you will be working with both pre-sale and post-sale.
  
  

You'll design and build comprehensive POCs, showcasing the value of our solutions and their fit for the prospect's specific technical needs. You'll also be the point person for all technical questions, providing technical answers or seamlessly connecting prospects with the right team member. Working alongside sales representatives and account executives in your team, you'll be analyzing customer needs and proposing effective solutions.
  
  

You'll ensure successful customer onboarding and product adoption, becoming a trusted advisor for our enterprise customers. Leveraging your understanding of technical knowledge, you'll proactively solve complex problems and identify areas for optimization. As a champion for best practices, you'll advocate for effective processes within the sales organization. You'll also provide guidance and mentorship to junior colleagues, fostering a collaborative and supportive environment.
  
Skills & Requirements
  
  

Who you are
  
  

-
  
You have previous experience of sales in the software industry, both pre-sales and post-sales, and an understanding of technical frameworks
  
  

-
  
Experience in cloud app architecture and web app development, including experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud), web frameworks (React, Angular, Node.js), APIs, and python scripting
  
  

-
  
You can explain technical cybersecurity concepts with ease through presentations, demos, and whiteboard sessions and have the ability to run a full POC and troubleshoot technical challenges
  
  

-
  
You'll analyze client needs and craft solutions that seamlessly integrate Detectify into their security posture
  
  

-
  
You thrive on tackling complex challenges, finding creative solutions that empower businesses
  
  

So, what do you think?
  
  

We are proud to foster an inclusive workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better product. This is something we value deeply and we encourage everyone to be a part of changing the way the world thinks about security! Go hack yourself!
  
  

Hybrid work
  
  

This position is for the Stockholm office. We offer hybrid working, with access to our office in central Stockholm. We currently do not offer relocation for this position
  
  

Started by a group of ethical hackers, Detectify offers cybersecurity solutions that combine human ingenuity with automation. We believe that the fear of cyber threats should never stand in the way of digital greatness.
  
  

At Detectify, your opinion and ideas matter. You'll belong to a diverse, dedicated, and forever curious team that recognizes the power of knowledge sharing and challenging the status quo.
  
  

Want to know more about what it is like working at Detectify? Visit our career site.

title: Enterprise Architect for the Automotive sector
description:
***Business & Technology Solutions*** ***(BTS) is a key team within Capgemini, specialising in navigating our clients through the complexities and interdependencies that characterise large-scale technology-enabled transformation programmes. We are 4000+ BTS consultants in Europe and 20+ in Sweden. Our team of experienced business analysts, IT architects and transformation managers, support our clients in designing, planning, and conducting digital transformations in their business. We’re striving to understand client’s business, current and future challenges, as well as their IT environment. We then propose, design, plan and help to implement new technological solutions or changes in the current IT landscape to improve or transform relevant business processes. We often define requirements for new IT projects that are later implemented by other Capgemini units or external partners.***  

  

**We are looking for Enterprise Architects to join our Automotive team, where you work with some of the leading a most well-known brands within this industry driving their digitalization journey. Architects are at the heart of our business – they help our clients make sense of new and existing technologies and help them make informed decisions on how to exploit the current technology landscape to their best advantage. Often working as part of a team, our architects are experts in our world-class architectural approach and industry standards.**  

  

**The responsibilities will vary between initiatives, you will:**

* **Drive change that creates business opportunity through technology innovation. Architects shape and translate business and digital strategy and needs into realizable, sustainable technology solutions. Architects take end-to-end solution delivery ownership from idea to benefits delivery.**
* **Provide insight, thought leadership and innovation to ensure that the solution meets the client’s business goals.**
* **Ensure that the solution is designed for production and can be delivered efficiently maximizing re-use.**
* **Ensure that the solution has integrity (is safe, secure and compliant).**
* **As an enterprise architect you play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and digital. To support our customers in their digital transformation projects, Capgemini is looking for enterprise architects with passion for business and technology serving the Automotive sector.**  

  

**What you'll bring:**
* **Experience working in the automotive domain**
* **Experience in Requirements elicitation and analysis**
* **Detailed understanding of Systems Lifecycles and design**
* **Process and platform experience in one or more of the following – Supply Chain Management, Sourcing and Procurement, Sales & Distribution, Manufacturing processes, Connected Services and ecommerce**
* **Experience of implementing larger transformation programs**
* **Experience with SAP, Microsoft and Salesforce is a plus**
* **You are characterized by your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation**  

  

***Please note that all applicants must be fluent in Swedish.***  

***D*** ***uring annual summer leave BTS team will not review applications - but will do when we are all back on Monday 19th of August. For more information, call recruiter Rebecca at 0768 039 386.***

  

**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

description:

**At Capgemini, we are dedicated to helping businesses thrive by providing innovative solutions and expert consulting services. We are looking for a highly skilled SAP BTP Integration Lead to become a key member of our growing team.**

**- Ensure that integration solutions meet company requirements and industry standards.**

**- At least 2 years of experience in modern SAP integration technology related to SAP BTP Integration Suite including SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI).**  

**- At least 4 years of experience in delivering SAP integration solutions for on-premises and hybrid.**  

**- Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.**  

**- Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.**  

**- Bachelor's or Master's degree** **in a related field.**

* **You experience using SAP API Management and/or BTP Integration Suite B2B capabilities.**

title: Integration Engineer
description:
**Join Our Team as an Integration Engineer and Shape the Future of Digitalization**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Are you driven by the challenge of crafting top-tier API and event-driven solutions using platforms like MuleSoft, Boomi, Apigee, or cloud services (Azure, AWS & GCP)?**

**In an era where digital innovation paves the way for extraordinary customer experiences and cutting-edge technologies such as artificial intelligence, there lies a unique opportunity for organizations to harness technology to forge ahead.**

**Data stands at the heart of any triumphant digital strategy. Yet, the hurdle of integrating this data across diverse systems, platforms, and devices—whether entrenched in legacy systems or floating in the cloud—is one many organizations grapple with. At Capgemini, we bridge the gap for our national and international clients, enabling them to actualize their digital aspirations. Are you ready to be part of our expanding team in Gothenburg?**

**YOUR ROLE**
-------------

**As an Integration Engineer, you’ll be pivotal in aiding our clients through their digital transformation journeys. Your role will involve discerning business requirements and championing IT solutions that epitomize efficiency, utilizing the latest in technology, collaborative efforts, and problem-solving acumen.**

**You’ll craft and deploy integrative solutions that traverse the IT landscape, ensuring the end results resonate with the organization’s objectives. Your expertise will liberate data from isolated systems, amalgamate data into streamlined processes, and tether applications to data through deliberate and reusable services—all in real-time.**

**Collaborating intimately with Capgemini’s specialists and our clients, you’ll be an integral part of the development team, interfacing with product owners and various stakeholders.**

**Our robust market presence, coupled with our clientele—comprising Sweden’s most prominent names in both public and private sectors—affords us the privilege of engaging in broad and thrilling digital transformation projects, propelling us towards continual growth and development.**

**YOUR PROFILE**
----------------

* **Proven experience in integration development and/or cloud integrations**
* **Comfortable in agile teams and contemporary development settings**
* **Higher education degree or equivalent**
* **Proficient in customer communications, both verbal and written, in Swedish and English**

title: Digital Architect
description:
**OM ROLLEN**  

**Capgeminis Digitala Arkitekt-team i Skåne söker nya kollegor! Som Digital Arkitekt arbetar du med att designa och modernisera integrationer och större lösningar hos våra kunder. Med både bredd och djup erbjuder vi fantastiska möjligheter att förädla dina arkitekturfärdigheter, dela kunskap och utveckla dig tillsammans med skickliga kollegor i teamet. Du kan stationeras i Malmö eller Helsingborg efter vad du föredrar, båda kontoren centralt belägna med havsutsikt; över kajen i Malmö eller Öresund med blick mot Helsingör i Helsingborg.**  

  

**Vi har tre stora huvudområden för teamet:**  

* **Integrationer med och utan moln (hybrid och multi-cloud)**
* **Enterprise arkitektur**
* **Composability**

  

**DIN PROFIL**  

* **Du är en person som redan har gedigen erfarenhet inom minst två av de huvudområden som nämns ovan**
* **Du har hands-on erfarenhet inom Azure, AWS eller GCP och kan bevisa det med motsvarande certifiering**
* **Du är tekniskt begåvad och har med största sannolikhet någon gång arbetat som utvecklare**
* **Du har god kommunikations- och presentationsförmåga i kombination med förmåga att leda och vilja att ta ansvar för kundleveranser**
* **Du ska trivas med tanken på att modernisera äldre lösningar som nått olika långt på olika plan och har massvis med konstiga integrationsplattformar och legacy-teknik, men även att bygga upp nya lösningar från scratch**
* **Du skriver och talar flytande svenska**
**Meriterande om du även har:**  

* **Erfarenhet av att skapa arkitektur för större lösningar med många inblandade produkter och multi-cloud**
* **Erfarenhet av att designa eventbaserade lösningar**
  

**VAD VI TROR KOMMER FÅ DIG ATT TRIVAS**  

**Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med andra digitala arkitekter inom Capgemini. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i projekt med medelstora och stora internationella samt multinationella kunder. Du har friheten att utveckla dig själv med hjälp av Capgeminis egen utbildningsplattform som bl.a. ger dig tillgång till all molnrelaterad utbildning. Berätta om dina ambitioner och vi ser fram emot att hjälpa dig att nå dem: Get the future you want med oss på Capgemini!**  

  

**Förmåner:**  

* **Föräldraförmån**
* **Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy**
* **Tech communities**
* **Mentorskapsprogram (som mentor eller mentee)**
* **Delaktighet i Capgeminis olika fokusområden; Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club, Art club etc.**
* **Generöst friskvårdsbidrag & tjänstepension**
* **Bonusprogram**
* **Kompetensutveckling i form av utbildningar och certifieringar**
* **Roliga och inspirerande personalevent**
* **Företagshälsovård & sjukvårdsförsäkring**
  

**ANSÖKAN**  

**Just nu har vi semesterperiod och hoppas att även du njuter av en fin sommar. Vi ser framemot att läsa igenom din ansökan när vi är tillbaka från semester och förväntar oss att kunna återkoppla dig mot slutet av augusti när vi är åter! Stort tack för ditt tålamod!**

**OM CAPGEMINI**  

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.**  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

title: Account Security Manager
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**Account Security Manager**
----------------------------

**Get the opportunity to work together with highly talented and senior consultants on exiting projects and services within Cloud & Infrastructure Services. We’re currently looking for an Account Security Manager for a large enterprise customer.**  



**Capgemini offers a wide range of managed information security services to major corporate and public sector customers. In order to further strengthen our experienced information security team, we are now looking for a person for the Managed Services unit of our Cloud Infrastructure Services.**  

  

**In order to succeed as an Account Security Manager, you have experience in information security consulting and extensive technical knowledge in the field of cybersecurity. You see yourself as a technology expert who can help customers get more business value from information security. You also have strong expertise in identifying customers' ICT information security needs and the ability to bring added value solutions to them. Thanks to the close cooperation with the customer, we expect you to feel at home effectively moving things forward in a people-oriented role in both Swedish and English.**  

  

**Role**  

**The core of the job description of Account Security Manager is to take care of the customer's general data security in relation to the solutions offered by Capgemini and cooperation with the customer through regular meetings. Account Security Manager should be capable to support deliver perform below duties by working closely with accounts teams and clients:**  

* **Being the single point of contact (SPOC) for client’s organization regarding supplier’s security capability and maturity, and to maintain the security governance framework, including risk management**
* **Provide senior security advisory in all aspects of the delivery**
* **Ensure that IT risk management and compliance requirements are fulfilled in service operations**
* **Ensure that security requirements are reflected in the services, technical infrastructure, and ways of working, and support client’s audits (for example ISO27001)**
* **Maintain the operational security tasks in the SOC and support client’s audits**
* **Maintain proper lifecycle management, quality assurance and efficiency throughout all security services**
* **Check and approving the customer's information security principles, measures, guidelines, and general responsibilities**
* **Approve and prioritize of information security development and improvement activities**
* **Review of data security breaches**

  

**Qualifications**  

**We believe that you are a person who:**  

* **is passionate about Information and IT Security as well as cybersecurity**
* **stays current with an ever-changing threat landscape, risk and mitigation strategies and roles and responsibilities via continuous education, certification, and professional development**
* **has the ability to spot and assess security risks wherever they may exist**
* **Have full working proficiency in both Swedish and English**

  

**We also expect you to have experience in the following requirements:**  

* **Information security services and solutions related to cybersecurity, such as: Strong Authentication, IAM, Cloud Security, Network Security, Security Encryption, DLP, Firewall, IDS/IPS, End Point Security, Vulnerability Management, SIEM**
* **The ITIL framework**
* **Ability to write system descriptions and process documentation, and produce quality reporting as a whole.**
* **CISSP or equivalent certificate (e.g., CISA/CISM)**

**Rollen**  

**I rollen som mekanikingenjör kommer du arbeta med en av våra stora kunder inom försvarindustrin i Malmö och Lund. Vill du arbeta med utvecklingen av världsledande jaktflygplan, undervattensteknik, avancerade vapensystem eller toppmoderna flyglednings- och radarsystem? Vill du bidra med dina ingenjörskunskaper för att skapa ett säkrare samhälle? Har du dessutom minst 3 års erfarenhet av produktutveckling, då är du kanske personen vi söker!**  

  

**Vår kund arbetar i agila team och det är därför bra om du har viss erfarenhet av det sedan tidigare. Har du arbetat med konstruktioner i stål, plast och kanske även ritat kablage sitter du på värdefull kompetens.**  

  

**Vad vi erbjuder dig**  

**På Capgemini Engineering vill vi skapa möjligheter för dig att stärka din karriär. Vi vill att du känner att du har en solklar karriärsplan, där du även får möjlighet att utveckla din kompetens på vägen.**  

  

**Vi arbetar aktivt för att din anställning hos oss ska kännas trygg och utvecklande. Förutom din professionella utveckling med oss erbjuder vi även andra aktiviteter, så som After works, sportevent, föreläsningar eller communities som Woman in Engineering!**  

  

**Vi tror att du har**

* **En B.Sc eller högre inom Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronic Engineering eller liknande utbildningsinriktning**
* **Erfarenhet av arbete i CAD- och PLM system, företrädesvis CREO**
* **Språkkunskaper där du kommunicerar fritt på Svenska och Engelska i tal och skrift. Ytterligare språkkunskaper är meriterande**
* **Goda kunskaper i framtagande av 3D- och 2D underlag med tillhörande toleranssättning där producerbarhet, kostnader och kravbild tas i beaktning**
* **Förmåga att arbeta både i team och självständigt i en utmanande och innovativ miljö där komplexa krav ställer din förmåga på sin spets**

**Denna tjänst kräver svenskt medborgarskap samt att man blir godkänd i en säkerhetsprövning i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen.**

**Övrigt**  

**Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.**  

  

**Just nu är det semestertider på Capgemini Engineering. Vi ser framemot att gå igenom din ansökan när vi är tillbaka igen i slutet av augusti. Tack för ditt tålamod och ha en fin sommar!**

  

**#LI-JM16**

**At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.**

title: Senior Data Scientist Consultant
description:
**Avigna** is hiring for a **"Senior Data Scientist Consultant"** role.


Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for European customers. We are looking for a **Senior Data Scientist Consultant to** join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations and workflow improvements, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient cost and schedule management. If you want to grow and build the foundation on the IT platform working across multiple customers, look no further.


In alignment with Aviana's values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.

  

Experience: Mid-level (3-6 years), Senior (6-10 years)


Location: Stockholm


Mode of work: Remote


Contract duration: 7 months

 **Responsibilities:**

  

In this role, you will be responsible for daily tasks such as model development, data analysis, programming, and optimization. Strong technical competence in Python programming, machine learning, and cloud experience (particularly with GCP) is required. Candidates should also possess solid mathematical and statistical knowledge. While senior-level expertise is preferred, no specific cloud certification is necessary for this role.

**Must have skills:**

* Python programming skills
* Machine learning experience
* Cloud (GCP) experience)
* Mathematical and statistical knowledge
* Senior level


If you are a motivated Data Scientist with the required experience and skills, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

title: Junior SAP Data Consultant
description:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.


We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.


“Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” – **Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO.**

**About our Nordic SAP Business Group:**


Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies.


Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.


We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking for candidates on several positions and seniority levels.


To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index

**SAP Data Nordic Value Tower:**


Within the SAP Value Tower Data, we offer you the opportunity to work with SAP Data and to grow your knowledge within the area of Information Management, connected to SAP MDG, Master Data Management and Data Migration.


We are looking for people who have a genuine interest in Data, want to grow and challenge themselves within that area and work with the best skilled colleagues.

**Role Overview:**


As a junior SAP Data Consultant in Accenture’s Nordic SAP Business Group, you will be an integral part of our team supporting our clients SAP transformation projects through acting as a Functional Expert in the Data Migration and/or Data Governance areas. You will work closely with clients, translating their business and functional requirements into SAP design documents and overseeing solution delivery.

**Example project roles:**

* Advise clients on their data transformation strategies, driving value creation through the positioning of SAP enabled solutions as well as leading solutions from SAP partners and Accenture
* Be part of the data migration stream of an S/4HANA transformation, working with colleagues in delivery centers to execute on their data transformation and data upload strategies
* Work with clients on their transformational journey, by implementing Master Data Governance strategy and processes, following SAP best practices and Accenture’s proven ways of working

**What’s in it for you:**

* Help Accenture deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity
* Be part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment
* Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery
* Enjoy competitive compensation and benefits
* Develop your skills and build an extraordinary career
* Grab significant development and training opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills
* Get internal coaching, support and guidance from a mentor, to progress in your work and professional career with continuous feedback
* Gain access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert networks and benchmarks
* Combine business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how
* Transform businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies
* Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects
* Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects
* Play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!

  

**Qualifications**

**Must have:**

* Deep interest in the importance of Data
* Passion about innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients
* Strong resonance with Accenture’s values
* Motivation, persistence, eagerness to optimize and drive for excellence
* Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility and to be a team player
* Willingness and ability to quickly learn new concepts and technologies
* Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment
* Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner
* Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English
* Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken
* A Bachelor or Master’s degree

**Very nice to have:**

* Experience with Data Migration and/or Data Governance
* Previous exposure to or user of SAP
* Knowledge in a functional or business process area
* Technical development (programming) background

**Locations**


Gothenburg, Malmö, Stockholm

title: Client Executive - Financial Sector
description:
**Financial Services** **in the Nordics is part of the global financial services organization at Capgemini. We are working with the largest banks and insurance companies in the Nordics. In Stockholm, we are a growing team of enthusiastic and driven colleagues with different backgrounds and experiences. We are in a time of transition, where our current ways of working are being reinvented.**  

  

**About the role:**  

  

**We are now searching for a strategic Client Executive to strengthen our business development and team growth. In this role your main task is to drive the client strategy, proactively shape, develop and close business opportunities, as well as further develop business relationships. You will have the end to end client responsibility and can expect an international and inspiring working environment.**  

  

**What you’ll do:**

* **Set the strategy for your clients and segment.**
* **Drive client conversations as a trusted advisor.**
* **Build and expand customer relationships with key stakeholders.**
* **Identify areas where Capgemini can create more client value and pro-actively approach clients with proposals.**
* **Conduct client presentations, prepare estimates, win strategies and participate in or lead negotiations with client stakeholders.**
* **Lead the team and own an end to end account responsibility connected to bookings and revenue budget as well as a contribution margin target.**

  

**We believe that you have:**

* **5-10 years of experience of working in the consulting industry with sales, business development and client management.**
* **Consulting and advisory experience, with the ability to shape projects and contribute to deliveries when needed.**
* **A customer centric mindset with experience in building trusted relationships with key business and IT stakeholders.**
* **Fluency in English and one of the Scandinavian languages is required.**
* **A good understanding of the financial services industry (Insurance & banking) and how it will evolve in the coming years is beneficial.**

  

**Get the future you want:**  

  

**By joining our team, you will have the opportunity to help shape the future, form the culture, and together decide on important goals. We focus on inclusion and embrace and empower talent in all its diverse forms and origins. We are valuing work-life balance with flexible working arrangements. You also get access to a wide range of our global training programs. Our way of working is centered around our seven values: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Fun, Freedom, Team Spirit and Modesty.**  

  

**Apply now:**  

  

**As the Financial Services industry is constantly evolving, every day is part of an exciting journey. This is your chance to get involved in exciting delivery in a global company and really make a difference. Our team is looking forward to your application!**  

  

**About Capgemini**  

  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want |** **www.capgemini.com**

-----------------------------

description:

-------------------

---------------------------

title: Enterprise Architect for Retail/CPRD - Business & Technology Solutions
description:
***Business & Technology Solutions*** ***(BTS) is a key team within Capgemini, specialising in navigating our clients through the complexities and interdependencies that characterise large-scale technology-enabled transformation programmes. We are 4000+ BTS consultants in Europe and 20+ in Sweden. Our team of experienced business analysts, IT architects and transformation managers, support our clients in designing, planning, and conducting digital transformations in their business. We’re striving to understand client’s business, current and future challenges, as well as their IT environment. We then propose, design, plan and help to implement new technological solutions or changes in the current IT landscape to improve or transform relevant business processes. We often define requirements for new IT projects that are later implemented by other Capgemini units or external partners.***  

  



**We are looking for** **Enterprise Architects** **to join our Retail/CPRD team, where you work with some of the leading a most well-known brands within this industry driving their digitalization journey. Architects are at the heart of our business – they help our clients make sense of new and existing technologies and help them make informed decisions on how to exploit the current technology landscape to their best advantage. Often working as part of a team, our architects are experts in our world-class architectural approach and industry standards.**  

  

**You will:**

* **Establish technology strategy and roadmap supporting current and future business capabilities**
* **Work on portfolio or program level addressing architectural concerns cross value streams**
* **Contribute to the strategic direction of the enterprise architecture and technology investments to maximize the ROI**
* **Shape and execute business transformation through technology**
* **Advise clients on technology solutions enabling them taking advantage of current and emerging opportunities**
* **Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals**  

  

**What you'll bring:**
* **Retail business and industry expertise**
* **Experience working as an Enterprise Architect in large scale IT transformation programs**
* **Experience working with Agile methodologies and TOGAF**
* **Deep knowledge in at least one of the following frameworks and standards - IT4IT, ITIL, ArchiMate and TOGAF**
* **Experience in one (or more) of the three major public clouds - Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud or Amazon Web Services**
* **Excellent communication skills and demonstrated ability to deliver results through leading, advising and collaborating in complex environments**
* **Strong analytical and decision-making capabilities**
* **You are characterized by your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation**  

  

***Please note that all applicants must be fluent in Swedish.***  

***Please note during annual summer leave BTS team will not review applications - we are all back on Monday 19th of August. For more information, call recruiter Rebecca at 0768 039 386.***

  

**About Capgemini**

title: Presales Solution Consultant, Employee Experience & HR Service Delivery
description:
**Company Description**  

At ServiceNow, our technology makes the world work for everyone, and our people make it possible. We move fast because the world can’t wait, and we innovate in ways no one else can for our customers and communities. By joining ServiceNow, you are part of an ambitious team of change makers who have a restless curiosity and a drive for ingenuity. We know that your best work happens when you live your best life and share your unique talents, so we do everything we can to make that possible. We dream big together, supporting each other to make our individual and collective dreams come true. The future is ours, and it starts with you.


With more than 7,400+ customers, we serve approximately 80% of the Fortune 500, and we're on the 2021 list of FORTUNE World's Most Admired Companies®.


Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.

 **Job Description**  

As an **Employee Workflows Solutions Consultant** you bring your passion for HR technology to our clients in the EMEA North region. You combine HR culture with a good knowledge of the HR Technology landscape, and you bring a strategic mindset to the business. In addition, you have a passion to develop, position and deliver product-specific solutions during sales cycles.


You will be our brand ambassador and will represent both our company and HR product solutions in front of our prospects, customers and partners. You will also act as product expert and be fully engaged in the sales cycles to understand our customers strategies and needs, prepare and configure product demonstrations to showcase how our solution fits their needs. You will also actively participate in marketing events to present and promote our solutions. Good customer advocacy skills, the ability to learn quickly along with the ability to translate technical capabilities into business benefits is crucial.

**What is expected in this role:**


Together with a dedicated solution sales specialist, you are responsible for:

* Business Process analysis to prove the value of our product for the business situation of your client
* Identify demands within the HR/Workplace/Legal functions for our platform
* Contribution to sales campaigns focussed on the Employee Experience solution suite, which includes HR Service Delivery, Workplace Service Delivery and Legal Service Management.
* Lead discovery workshops to determine customers’ business challenges and deliver product demonstrations aligned to customer needs.
* Prepare, configure and deliver solution demonstrations to customers in person and virtually to showcase how our solution fits their needs and resolves their business issues.
* Answer questions related to product features from our customers, channel partners and ServiceNow colleagues.
* Respond to Request for Information/Proposal documents.
* Provide product feedback & enhancements requests to Product Management.
* Help develop programs that enable the field sales organisation to demonstrate the value of Employee Workflows, and HR Service Management on the ServiceNow platform.
* Share and learn best practices and re-usable assets with other Solution Consultants to enhance the quality and efficiency of the team.
* Stay current on competitive analysis and market differentiation.
* Support marketing events including executive briefings, conferences, user groups, and trade shows

  

**Qualifications** **To be successful in this role candidates typically have:**

* Proven experience of pre-sales solutions consulting, post-sales implementation in IT software industry, or as an HR practioner.
* Knowledge of the **Employee Experience, HR Service Delivery or HCM landscape** a plus
* Experience in delivering complex solutions to clients in multiple industries.
* Passion for technology and experience in cloud software solutions.
* Excellent communication skills in written and spoken English, in both business and technical concepts
* A confident and engaging presentation style, with the ability to tell a compelling story
* Proven track record of presenting at to a variety of stakeholders, (technical, functional and C-suite
* Proactive and independent mindset. Fast learner with the ability to complete tasks in an organised, detailed way with minimal supervision.
* Experience working collaboratively across a complex sales eco-system
* Creative problem-solving skills with a growth mindset and desire to work in a fast-paced, high growth organisation.
* Fluent in English and Finnish or Swedish
* Willingness to travel across the region as necessary.

  

**Additional Information**  

ServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status or any other category protected by law.


All new employees hired in the United States are required to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19, subject to such exceptions as required by law. If hired, you will be required to submit proof of full vaccination or have an approved accommodation, by your start date. Visit our Candidate FAQ page to learn more.


If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact us at talent.acquisition@servicenow.com for assistance.


For positions requiring access to technical data subject to export control regulations, including Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may have to obtain export licensing approval from the U.S. Government for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by the U.S. Government.


Please Note: Fraudulent job postings/job scams are increasingly common. Click here to learn what to watch out for and how to protect yourself. All genuine ServiceNow job postings can be found through the ServiceNow Careers site.

**Work Personas**


Work personas are categories that are assigned to employees depending on the nature of their work. Employees will fall into one of three categories: Remote, Flexible or Required in Office.

**Required in Office**


A required in office work persona is defined as an employee who is contracted to work from or aligned to a ServiceNow-affiliated office. This persona is required to work from their assigned workplace location 100% of the work week based on the business needs of their role.

**Flexible**


A flexible work persona is defined as an employee who is contracted to work from or aligned to a ServiceNow-affiliated office and will work from their assigned workplace location roughly 3 days/week or less (generally around 40-60% of the work week). Flexible employees may choose to work the remaining working time from their workplace location or home. Flexible employees are required to work within their state, province, region, or country of employment.

**Remote**


A remote work persona is defined as an employee who performs their responsibilities exclusively outside of a ServiceNow workplace and is not contracted or aligned to a ServiceNow-affiliated office, including those whose place of work (pursuant to their terms and conditions of employment) is their home. Remote employees are required to work within their state, province, region, or country of employment.

title: Global SAP CoE Enterprise Architect
description:
**Job summary**
---------------

  

***The Global SAP CoE is the deal shaping, pre-sales and go-to-market leading team in charge of shaping and selling Large Business Transformation Programmes across all Regions (Americas, Europe, APAC). The SAP CoE core team is made of Business and Solutions experts, Program Management Advisors and Enterprise Architects, that are driving the rapid expansion of our SAP business globally around SAP S/4HANA , BTP and RISE. We spend every day focused on developing opportunities directly with clients and partners, helping them get the best business value from their SAP transformation. With more than 1500 SAP S/4HANA projects globally, a unique value-driven end-to-end transformation approach and a wide set of business and IT capabilities, Capgemini offers you the opportunity to work on the most interesting SAP S/4 HANA projects.***  

  

**You as a Global SAP CoE team member will be assigned to be a part of SAP Global CoE -located in either North America or Europe - to support the digital transformation of global companies and respond to their challenges of transforming their businesses around SAP solutions (S/4HANA at the core, BTP, and all required extensions from both SAP, Hyper-scalers or other third party SAP partners). You will be a key figure of the early shaping, ERP advisory, solutioning and delivery of SAP transformation programmes, leveraging our unique and flexible end-to-end Large Transformation Programme and Reference model approach. Starting from the business ambition, we translate it into a target architecture and progressive roadmap that delivers business value faster, by combining “core SAP” implementation of SAP S/4HANA and Agile delivery for the BTP and other best-of-breed Cloud applications.**  

  

**Given the key contribution that it brings to Capgemini SAP business globally – both in presales and in projects - the Global SAP CoE has a highly visible profile, both internally and externally and is viewed as a crucial element in driving the growth and success of Capgemini. As a SAP Global CoE team member, you will be at the heart of our continued expansion of SAP business.**  

  

**Your field of play is North America or Europe – the job can be based anywhere and includes a combination of work from home and physical presence at customers or events as required.**

**Your profile as global SAP CoE Enterprise Architect**
-------------------------------------------------------

  

**Architecture is key to enable agile and value driven Digital Transformation supported by S/4HANA as the core and enriched with Vertical Apps in the Cloud. Our Multi-Pillar S/4HANA architecture provides a framework for these multi-components, multi-cloud architectures and Capgemini is recognized for this expertise in complex architectures.**  

  

**As Enterprise Architect, you will be a key figure to shape, solution and deliver large business led transformation programmes, across various industries – Retail, CP, Automotive, Life Sciences, Aerospace & Defense, High Tech, Machinery - helping them build their multi-pillar architectures based on SAP S/4 and BTP solutions, integrated with best-in-class Apps, in a multi-Cloud environment.**  

  

**You will have a passion to work with our clients, advising them on how to design their enterprise architecture to get the most out of their SAP and Cloud technologies.**  

  

* **Enterprise Architecture experience on more than 5 major projects, including SAP and other technologies like SAP BTP, Cloud solutions, specialized packages, to cover the full end-to-end business processes.**
* **Strong knowledge of SAP including BTP and other PaaS & third-party tools.**
* **Experienced in using enterprise architecture modelling tools like LeanIX.**
* **Technical architecture / how to refresh and re-build estates / Integration**
* **Evidence of pre-sales experience, with the demonstrable ability to shape and structure RFx responses.**
* **Experience in presenting to senior client stakeholders up to and including CxO-level.**
* **Knowledge of the strategic direction of SAP products and how to architect those into a consistent framework.**
* **You have a passion to work with our clients, advising them on how best to architect their IT landscape – for future and evolving business needs.**
* **Endowed with natural leadership abilities, your qualities of customer relationship and business development are recognized.**
* **Oriented towards the satisfaction of your customers, you are driven by a taste for challenges, and you know how to transform constraints into opportunities.**
* **You are used to working in an international environment, with different teams – Business Advisory Consultants, Solution Experts, Marketing and Sales teams, and create networks across countries.**
* **You are an engaging and enthusiastic communicator, with strong interpersonal and presentation skills.**
* **Your experience in presenting to senior client stakeholders goes up to and including CxO-level.**
* **Additionally you are able to demonstrate either experience or willingness to learn.**
* **You have strong connections with the broader SAP ecosystem e.g. SAP and other relevant partner organisations.**
* **You are mobile, you have a good level of Business English and you like innovative projects. An offshore or international experience would be a real plus!**

  

**You will have a depth of consulting and functional experience across SAP and partner components in your area of expertise, a strong knowledge of the strategic direction of SAP in your expertise domain, and a clear vision of related trends in different Industries.**  

**You will work alongside our Architects extensive capability network to go beyond your areas of expertise when needed.**

title: Service Now Consultant
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**Get the opportunity to work together with highly talented and senior consultants on exiting projects within Cloud & Infrastructure Services.**

**Due to significant growth created by an ever-increasing client demand, we are looking to further bolster our group of Service Now Experts. You will be a part of the Capgemini Cloud & Edge Projects and Consulting Practice that is primarily responsible for providing client centric Public & Private Cloud, End User productivity and service integration solutions. It provides a variety of client services, which range from initial strategic advice right through to project delivery & implementation. You will be based in our office in Stockholm, Gothenburg or Malmö.**  



**The role**

**In this role you can expect to:**

* **Work closely with customers to research, design, develop and deliver innovative solutions to improve their business processes**
* **Assists ServiceNow Business Analyst in estimating release level of effort. Makes recommendations which yield a more cost-effective product and better streamlined workflows**
* **Responsible for the overall design of the application and enable innovative solutions to drive process automation across IT Services on ServiceNow Platform**
* **Assist or drive design workshops across projects to work with other IT streams to improve the platform adoption and user experience of ServiceNow**
* **Ability to prepare prototypes in demo instances for proposed solutions**
* **Analyzing ServiceNow releases and upgrades and how it impacts the current features and applications in use**
* **Design and architect ServiceNow CMDB, discovery jobs, and automation workflows and flow using ServiceNow Orchestrator**
* **Create ServiceNow reports and dashboards**
* **Support with Pre-Sales activities and respondning to RFP’s and RFI’s**
* **Help and support Junior Consultants to grow within the ServiceNow area**

**Qualifications**

* **Have several years of technical and functional experience with ITIL Service Management processes**
* **Have several years of experience designing, developing, testing, implementing and maintaining ServiceNow platform and integrations**
* **ServiceNow Certified System Administrator**
* **Additional ServiceNow suite certifications is a plus**
* **Exceptional interpersonal, communication, facilitation and influencing skills**
* **Requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision**
* **Have strong supplier management skills to help provide direction and ensure quality of services**
* **Experience in managing an application, Agile/Scrum skills, ITIL Practitioner**
* **Demonstrable experience with the use of MS Office applications: Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, SharePoint, Project, Visio.**
* **Knowledge of web-based systems architecture, service-based architecture, enterprise application architecture and worked integration with other applications**
* **Experience in designing/developing/configuring architecture for ServiceNow modules/features as a minimum (ITSM, ITOM, HR, SAM, ITBM, CSM, FSM, SecOps, GRC, Orchestration)**
* **Experience within Multi Service Provider (MSP) solutioning based on ServiceNow**
* **Understanding of the key technologies relevant to the ServiceNow integration solutions including: SSO, SAML, SSL, Web Services, LDAP, JDBC, ODBC, REST, SCP, FTPS, JSON, SOAP**
* **General Understanding of Database technologies such as SQL, MySQL, Oracle**
* **Experience in planning and execution of ServiceNow upgrades**
* **ITIL Certified**
* **Knowledge in Swedish and a valid working permit for Sweden are required**

title: Salesforce PDE
description:
**Capgemini har varit en strategisk partner med Salesforce sedan 2007 och är ledande i Europa inom strategi, design, implementation och förvaltning av innovativa Salesforce-lösningar. Vi erbjuder helhetslösningar inom hela Salesforce-plattformen, inklusive Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Experience Cloud, Data Cloud, Mulesoft och Analytics. Vi arbetar tillsammans med andra kompetensområden inom Capgemini för att hjälpa våra kunder att uppnå effektivisering och tillväxt genom att införa Salesforce och andra teknologier. Som en av Nordens största aktörer inom Salesforce arbetar vi i spännande projekt med framstående experter inom området.**

**Om rollen:**

**Med målet att bli #1 Salesforce partner inom utvalda industrier och områden söker vi nu en Salesforce Partner Development Executive (PDE) som kommer att spela en central roll i vår Svenska organisation och vara vår primära kontaktpunkt för Salesforce i Sverige. I roller ansvarar du för vår Svenska Salesforce-affär med målet att utveckla portföljen och underhålla starka relationer med Salesforce med syftet att tillsammans generera och driva nya affärsmöjligheter. Du kommer även att arbeta nära vårt säljteam och vårt Salesforce Center of Excellence för att vinna prioriterade affärsmöjligheter.**

**Arbetsuppgifter:**
--------------------

* **Driva affärsplanen för Capgemini’s Salesforce-portfölj genom att analysera marknadstrender och kundbehov.**
* **Identifiera områden med hög tillväxtpotential och initiera affärsutvecklingsaktiviteter.**
* **Vara den primära kontaktpunkten för Salesforce Sverige, och utveckla relationen och partnerskapet.**
* **Facilitera gemensamma kontoplaner mellan Capgemini och Salesforce på utvalda kunder och prospect.**
* **Driva planering, genomförande och uppföljning av partnerrelaterade events och aktiviteter i Sverige.**
* **Bygga upp långsiktiga relationer med utvalda kunder.**
* **Arbeta nära säljteamet och vårt Salesforce Center of Excellence för att vinna affärer.**
* **Rapportera regelbundet om måluppfyllnad runt vår Salesforceaffär.**
**Vi söker dig med:**
---------------------

* **Erfarenhet inom försäljning, affärsutveckling eller arbete med partnerskap, och förmåga att identifiera och driva nya affärsmöjligheter.**
* **Erfarenhet av att leda framgångsrika affärsinitiativ inom Salesforce eller liknande plattformar som konsult eller anställd, ifrån initial projektuppstart till implementering och vidareutveckling.**
* **Djup förståelse för Salesforce-plattformens unika fördelar, förmåga att sälja hela Salesforce affärsportfölj.**
* **Förmåga att bygga och långsiktigt underhålla starka affärsrelationer med kunder och partners.**
* **Starka kommunikations- och förhandlingsfärdigheter.**
* **Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en snabbväxande och teamorienterad miljö.**
* **Flytande i svenska och engelska.**
* **Akademisk examen inom teknik och/eller ekonomi eller annan relevant utbildning är meriterande.**
* **Förståelse för Salesforce positionering av industrilösningar är meriterande.**

**Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i vårt arbete att bli #1 Salesforce partner inom utvalda industrier och domäner, samt arbeta i en växande och dynamisk miljö? Ansök nu och bli en del av Capgeminis Salesforce-team!**

title: Next generation Digital OT Engineer for smart factory solutions
description:
World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds. Coupled with the capabilities of the rest of the Group, it helps clients to accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.


Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.


We are looking for a Operational Technology (OT) Engineer who can bring value as a key resource to the development of innovative digital systems and technologies. You will belong to our local Nordic Digital Continuity team, we work closely with our Nordic clients and leverage all the knowledge, experiences, assets and frameworks that we have globally. This is a great opportunity and benefit for our clients. Our local Digital Continuity client base and local team is constantly growing, and we are continuously looking for new talents within Digital Continuity, PLM and close related domains. The position could be in any of our Capgemini engineering offices in Sweden (Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, Helsingborg etc.)
  

  

In our Nordic team we are pooling experts together, creating a place where we can be inspired, inspire others, coach and be coached, and find a common ground for insights and deliveries. We want you to become a part of our team, to help us grow and let the synergies of great talent take us to new levels with our clients and with the rest of Capgemini.
  

Join us and Get The Future You Want! Welcome with your application!
  

  

**You will work with:**  

* Fun projects with famous clients
* Competent colleagues who are passionate about technology and innovative solutions
* Colleagues in an environment of expertise to help you with your technical career
* Some of the best in the industry and constantly evolving
* Responsibility and ownership for good solutions for our customers

  

**We are looking for you who have:**  

* At least 4 years of programming experience in .Net C#, Backend/fullstack, integrations, API, Azure
* Advantageous if you have experience from the industry and OT (Operational Technology) and ERP integrations
* Have knowledge of one or more of these technologies: IOT, Microservices, SCADA, OPC, Unity3D/CAD
* You can turn challenges into concrete solutions
* Engineering education or other relevant education/project experience.
* Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbally
* At least 4 years of experience working in a Nordic country
* Swedish work permit or Swedish citizenship
#LI-MS8


At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.

title: Cloud Arkitekt
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.


**Vill du vara med och forma framtidens molnlösningar?**

På grund av stark tillväxt och ökande efterfrågan från våra kunder söker vi nu en skicklig Cloud Arkitekt till vårt Nordiska team. Hos Capgemini får du chansen att arbeta med spännande och betydelsefulla projekt för ledande organisationer i en dynamisk och internationell miljö. Bli en del av vår framgång och bidra till att driva innovativa lösningar framåt!  

  



**Vem du kommer att arbeta med**

Du blir en del av Capgeminis Cloud & Infrastructure Services (CIS)-enhet med fokus på projekt- och konsulttjänster i Norden. Vårt mål är att erbjuda kunder helhetslösningar inom Cloud med branschspecifik expertis, avancerad molnteknik och globala resurser. Vi erbjuder en mängd olika tjänster till våra kunder, från strategisk rådgivning till projektgenomförande.


**Fokus i din roll**

Du kommer att hjälpa kunder att optimera sin användning av molnresurser, som en del av en balanserad IT-leveransportfölj. Du kommer att vara engagerad i varierande Cloud-åtaganden och kundprojekt som täcker hela livscykeln, från förslag/motivering till projektdesign och implementation.


**Som Cloud Arkitekt kommer du att:**

* Designa och implementera skalbara, säkra och kostnadseffektiva molnarkitekturer som uppfyller affärsbehoven
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att samla in krav, definiera tekniska specifikationer och utveckla molnlösningar, som är i linje med affärsmålen och främjar hållbarhet (GreenOps)
* Utvärdera molntekniker och tjänster för att rekommendera bästa praxis och lösningar för att optimera prestanda, tillförlitlighet och skalbarhet
* Designa och distribuera molninfrastruktur med hjälp av ledande plattformar som AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* Utveckla och underhålla dokumentation, diagram och riktlinjer för moln-arkitektur
* Ge tekniskt ledarskap och mentorskap till juniora teammedlemmar, vilket främjar en kultur av kontinuerligt lärande och tillväxt
* Hålla dig uppdaterad gällande teknologier och branschtrender för att driva innovation och förbättra våra molnerbjudanden
* Arbeta nära kunder, partners och andra affärsenheter för att utveckla och genomföra innovativa och konkurrenskraftiga lösningar/projekt för nya och befintliga kunder genom att utnyttja dina tidigare erfarenheter av att implementera molnlösningar

**Vad du kommer att bidra med**

* Erfarenhet av att producera högtillgängliga molninfrastrukturlösningar för stora organisationer
* Gedigen kunskap om funktioner och möjligheter hos AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* God förståelse för cloud-native arkitekturer, mikrotjänster, containerisering och serverlös databehandling
* Skicklighet i verktyg för Infrastructure as Code (IaC), såsom Terraform eller CloudFormation
* Erfarenhet av att skapa greenfield-lösningar och implementera landningszoner enligt bästa praxis
* Erfarenhet av att snabbt utvärdera teknisk genomförbarhet och utveckla förslag för migrering av workloads till AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* Kunskap om praxis och verktyg för ekonomisk drift (FinOps) för optimering och hantering av molnkostnader
* Certifieringar såsom AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert eller Google Professional Cloud Architect är meriterande
* Erfarenhet av nätverksintegration med AWS Direct Connect eller Azure Express Route samt nätverksdesign (WAN/LAN/brandväggar)
* Förståelse för hybridmolnlösningar och erfarenhet av att integrera offentligt moln i traditionella hosting-/leveransmodeller
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

title: M365 Architect/SME
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.


We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Microsoft 365 Technical Architect to join our team. As a Microsoft 365 Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing Microsoft 365 solutions for our clients. You will work closely with clients to understand their business requirements and provide technical expertise to ensure successful deployment and adoption of Microsoft 365 technologies.
  

  

We are looking for a profile with a solid Microsoft 365 technical background combined with strong customer leadership skills. This role will require significant customer interaction and will drive architecture planning. The candidate must have broad, multi-discipline, Enterprise IT experience and must deliver customer-centric solutions that improve the user experience.
  

  

**The role:**  

* Work closely with customers to understand their technical and business needs and design Microsoft 365 SAAS based solutions that align with their goals and objectives to demonstrate how their Cloud Strategy aligns with Microsoft technology
* Develop and implement technical architectures for Microsoft 365 SAAS applications (Exchange, SharePoint, Teams etc.), Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Intune, hybrid on-premises technologies (AD, Entra Connect, ADFS, etc.) utilizing major 3rd party Identity Provider Solutions such as Ping ID and/or Okta and hygiene technologies and migration tools
* Develop and implement security controls for the aforementioned solutions with Microsoft security tools
* Conduct technical assessments and audits to identify areas for improvement and optimization within existing Microsoft 365 environments
* Stay up to date with the latest Microsoft 365 technologies, features, and best practices, and provide recommendations to clients for leveraging these advancements
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to Microsoft 365, including performance, connectivity, and security concerns
* Maintain documentation of technical architectures, configurations, and procedures related to Microsoft 365 solutions

* Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Information Systems, Computer Science, or equivalent experience

title: Senior MES Architect
description:
World leader in engineering and R&D services, Capgemini Engineering combines its broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software to support the convergence of the physical and digital worlds. Coupled with the capabilities of the rest of the Group, it helps clients to accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has more than 55,000 engineer and scientist team members in over 30 countries across sectors including Aeronautics, Space, Defense, Naval, Automotive, Rail, Infrastructure & Transportation, Energy, Utilities & Chemicals, Life Sciences, Communications, Semiconductor & Electronics, Industrial & Consumer, Software & Internet.


Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.


Capgemini Engineering Sweden has established a Center of Excellence within Intelligent Operations, pooling experts together, creating a place where we can be inspired, inspire others, coach and be coached, and find a common ground for insights and deliveries. We want you as a Solution Architect to become a part of our team, to help us grow and let the synergies of great talent take us to new levels with our clients and with the rest of Capgemini.
  

  

We offer you a work environment branded by innovation and a career with freedom, full of learning and development opportunities in a global environment and the support to help you achieve your best. You will be working with the cutting edge of IT and technology, surrounded by dedicated and skilled colleagues with high expertise.
  

We at Capgemini are committed to improving our collective performance by utilizing our inclusive work environment where different talents can thrive, hence diversity and inclusion are important cornerstones for us – which is also proven when we won the "World's Most Ethical Companies (WME) award" nine years in a row as well as other awards and accreditations.
  

  

**Your role**  

We’re looking for a Senior MES Architect who can bring value and work as a key person in our digital manufacturing, especially MES projects. You will act as a creator of architectural design, defining system requirements and use cases to address overall business requirements. You will provide industry best practices in IT/OT convergence and MES solution architecture and ensure that the technical solution remains aligned to business requirements. It would also be beneficial if you have experience in collaborating with machine suppliers to align their designs with the MES expectations and requirements.


**You can expect to engage in:**  

Pre-Sales Activities
  

* Initial customer discovery
* Understand customer needs on manufacturing area
* Work with sales develop customer proposals

  

Customer Project Delivery Activities
  

* Act as subject matter expert for MES products
* Lead deployment and Integration of customer MES solution
* Enhance and streamline customer manufacturing processes
* Enhance and streamline customer rollout plan for the MES products
* Act as mentor and guide for junior team members
* Lead and define MES system design and configuration for new manufacturing lines
  

**Your profile**  

* Demonstrated experience and expertise in developing and deploying multi-site MES Solutions, for example with technology vendors like Aveva, Siemens, SAP, Dassault
* Proficient in any modern programming language (Golang, Java, Python,.NET, C#…).
* At least 10 years of experience working from a Nordic country
* Expertise in Industry 4.0/5.0 and IT/OT convergence transformations
* Experience in applying industry standards like ISA-95
* Proven IT development experience as well as experience of multi-cultural project teams, where parts are located off-site
* Experience in agile solution deployment is an advantage
* University degree, preferably in the fields of computer science, engineering or manufacturing
* Good communication skills in English, both orally and written
At Capgemini Engineering we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism and innovation. We offer a job with variation that leaves plenty of room for initiative and development. In fact, we are not just offering you a job, we’re inviting you to be part of our community where we will provide you trainings, tools & grounds for professional and personal growth. Each career experience is assorted by an attractive salary package.

description:

----------------------------------------------

Join our expanding **Nordic SAP** team and help leading organizations unlock the value of technology. Capgemini is seeking an experienced Senior SAP PP Consultant to join our dynamic team.

title: Tech lead - Workday
description:
**Tech/Architect lead - Workday**
---------------------------------

Do you want to be a part of building up something new within Capgemini Nordics?
  

Do you see the potential in people and have a strong track record within team building?
  

Do you want to have a crucial role in advising and assisting our clients in leveraging Workday solutions to help them achieve their business goals?
  

  

If you’re motivated by a role that takes the lead in building a team and further develop our people, please read on. You may be the one we’re looking for!
  

  

As a leading global consulting company, Capgemini is dedicated to empowering our clients transformation journeys and being positive change makers. We are seeking a highly experienced and visionary Senior Workday HCM Architect to join our team. In this strategic role, you will be responsible for the overall architecture, design, and delivery of Workday Human Capital Management (HCM) solutions. You will partner with key stakeholders to understand business needs, develop technical strategies, and ensure that our Workday HCM system is robust, scalable, and aligned with our organizational goals.
  

  

**YOUR ROLE**

* Foster a collaborative and inclusive team environment, promoting open communication and knowledge sharing
* Collaborate closely with our client's HR department to understand their specific needs and requirements, and translate them into effective solutions utilizing the Workday platform
* Collaborate with sales and presales teams to develop winning strategies and deliver compelling proposals to clients
* Execute on company strategy to drive business growth and expansion
* Lead the design, implementation, and optimization of Workday HCM solutionsCollaborate with HR, IT, and other stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into Workday HCM configurations
* Provide expert-level support and troubleshooting for Workday HCM modules, including Core HCM, Compensation, Benefits, Recruiting, Talent Management, and Performance Management
* Manage Workday HCM system upgrades, enhancements, and integrations with other systems
* Stay current with Workday updates and industry trends to recommend best practices and innovative solutions
* Mentor and provide guidance to team members
**YOUR PROFILE**

* Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and motivate both senior and junior team members
* In-depth knowledge of the Workday HCM platform, including specialization within core HR, compensation, benefits, learning, recruiting, onboarding and/or projects
* Excellent problem-solving skills and strong architect mindset, and the ability to effectively communicate complex concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Minimum of 7-10 years of hands-on experience with Workday HCM, including extensive experience in system architecture and design
* Strong understanding of HR processes and best practices
* Proven experience in leading Workday HCM projects from concept to completion
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to interact with all levels of the organization
* Workday HCM certification is highly preferred
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment
* Minimum Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Human Resources, Business Administration, Computer Science)
Based in Sweden and proficient in a Nordic language

**Som agil projektledare har du en nyckelroll i agil utveckling, i regel som produktägare, release train engineer eller scrum master. Du kommer att verka på både organisations- och teamnivå med fokus på att förstå affärsbehoven och verksamheten samt driva värdeskapande förändring.**

* **Utveckling av skräddarsydda lösningar baserad på olika teknologier**
* **Effektivisera systemlandskap tex genom nya plattformar eller migrering till cloud**

  

**Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas. Utmaningen som agil projektledare är att våra kunder har olika agil målbild.**

* **Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska**

  

**… Meriterande :**  



* ***Scrum*** **Master-certifiering**
* ***SAFe*** **-certifiering**
